titleStmt.title: A damnable treason, by a contagious plaster of a plague-sore wrapt up in a letter, and sent to Mr. Pym : wherein is discovered a divellish, and unchristian plot against the High Court of Parliament, Oct. 25. 1641.

notesStmt.note: Woodcut port. of John Pym with complimentary verses on t.p.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
